page.title: 02TRANSPORT
page.content:
There are six local bus services during the week to the neighbouring towns of Swaffham(2), Watton, Dereham, Kings Lynn and the city of Norwich. Additionally there is a daily Eastern Counties service to Norwich which stops at the top of Necton on the A47.
The majority of the inhabitants own a car as they are essential for getting to work and for shopping out of the village. Those households where there are working sons or daughters can own up to 4 cars per house.
The rural roads are mainly narrow and full of bends. They are generally kept in good repair although some have several potholes. They are easily blocked by snow in Winter.The A47 is a very busy road particularly in Summer.
